title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 53.2 - Pilot station at western end of Long Island Sound
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 53.2 - Pilot station at western end of Long Island Sound

State Regulations

Sandy Hook pilots assigned to vessels bound into the Port of

New York by way of Sands Point or Execution Rocks or out of the port by the
same route shall board or leave such vessels in a boat stationed at City Island
or some other convenient and safe location authorized by the commissioners. Long Island Sound-Block Island Sound pilots in vessels arriving or departing by
way of Sands Point or Execution Rocks shall use similar boat
service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
53.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
